entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to a few rain showers or drizzle this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:36 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
